title: NBA Opening Night Reactions, and Previewing the Rest of the League | Group Chat
description:
We react to the Clippers beating the Lakers on opening night (2:00) as well as the offensive dominance of the Nets against the Warriors (27:00). Later, we look ahead to many of the teams and specific players starting their season tonight (47:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
